title: 443 - ROMA 39 (Wear a Mask! Pt 2)
description:
I respond to some of the feedback I've received in the past day or two in response to my posts on wearing masks. The article I mention in Nature is here.

Music: "I Don't Think You Understand," by Goliath Flores.



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
dc:creator: Chris Ryan
itunes:author: Chris Ryan
